about-subtitle: I'm a Full Stack Developer in Minas Gerais, Brazil
about-description: I am passionate about technology and driven to create solutions that make a difference. Graduating in Information Systems at the age of 22, I have had the opportunity to work on challenging projects, including initiatives in geotechnology and systems development for large companies.
about-description-second: With a strong ambition to grow professionally and explore the international market, I am always eager to learn and innovate. Beyond my love for development, I am an enthusiast of an active lifestyle and a great admirer of aviation. Easygoing and friendly, I value both moments of relaxation with friends and dedication to my work.
